name: ohm
description: An object-oriented language for parsing and pattern matching

scripts.prebootstrap: npm test --silent && cp dist/ohm-grammar.js dist/ohm-grammar.js.old && cp dist/built-in-rules.js dist/built-in-rules.js.old
scripts.bootstrap: npm run unsafe-bootstrap && npm test --silent || (echo 'Bootstrap failed.'; mv -v dist/ohm-grammar.js.old dist/ohm-grammar.js; mv -v dist/built-in-rules.js.old dist/built-in-rules.js)
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && uglifyjs dist/ohm.js > dist/ohm.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run bootstrap
scripts.unsafe-bootstrap: src/ohm-cmd.js src/ohm-grammar.ohm > dist/ohm-grammar.js.new && mv -f dist/ohm-grammar.js.new dist/ohm-grammar.js && src/ohm-cmd.js src/built-in-rules.ohm > dist/built-in-rules.js.new && mv -f dist/built-in-rules.js.new dist/built-in-rules.js

author: Alex Warth <alexwarth@gmail.com> (http://tinlizzie.org/~awarth)
